name: Integrate WooCommerce with Vend
author: Sujith222

sections.description:
This plugin will integrate VendHQ account with WooCommerce store, which means:

  1. All Simple products from VendHQ account can be imported to WooCommerce store.
  2. Already imported products can be updated as they are updated in VendHQ account with the click of a button.
  3. All WooCommerce Sales/Orders/Customers will be created in VendHQ account automatically in real-time.
  4. Inventory update happens from Vend to WooCommerce and also WooCommerce to Vend whenever a sale happens in WooCommerce.
  5. [Premium Feature] All Variable products from VendHQ account can be imported to WooCommerce store.
  6. [Premium Feature] Automatic product updates or sync.
  7. [Premium Feature] Automatic inventory updates from Vend to WooCommerce and also WooCommerce to Vend whenever a sale happens in WooCommerce.
  8. [Premium Feature] Brands can be imported to WooCommerce as Custom Taxonomy.
  9. [Premium Feature] Loyalty points can be tracked for sales hapenning in WooCommerce.

Note: The premium features are only available in the Premium version of the plugin. You can get in touch with us or purchase from here: https://bit.ly/product-website

Current limitations but are in our TODO list

  1. Does not import Composite products from Vend.

The Integration

Steps:

  1. Click “Vend Integration” on left menu in WordPress admin.
  2. Enter VendHQ Subdomain, VendHQ Personal Token and VendHQ Cashier User ID and Click “Save Settings”(Detailed instructions are in the page).
  3. Now you will be able to import products to WooCommerce by clicking the button “Import products to WooCommerce”.
sections.installation:
This plugin requires you to have the WooCommerce plugin already installed and activated in WordPress. Otherwise you won’t be able to activate this plugin. It is recommended that you use this plugin in a staging environment before installing it on production.

From WordPress Admin

  1. Go to “Plugins” > “Add New”.
  2. Search for “Integrate WooCommerce With Vend”.
  3. Once you find it click “Install” and after installing click “Activate”.

Manual

  1. Upload the folder “integrate-woocommerce-vend” to /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through WordPress admin: Go to “Plugins” and click the “Activate” link corresponding to the plugin.

After Activation

Steps:

  1. Click “Vend Integration” on left menu in WordPress admin.
  2. Enter VendHQ Subdomain, VendHQ Personal Token and VendHQ Cashier User ID and Click “Save Settings”(Detailed instructions are in the page).
  3. Now you will be able to import products to WooCommerce by clicking the button “Import products to WooCommerce”.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin import all the products?

The free version of the plugin will import all the Simple products and the premium version imports Variable products too.

What about Variable and Composite products in VendHQ?

Variable products are Premium feature. contact us here for purchasing: https://sujith123.wufoo.com/forms/z1xchp690scddy2/

Composite products are not currently supported.

Will WooCommerce work with my theme?

Yes, the plugin is not dependent on WordPress themes.

Where can I request new features?

You can use the form here: https://sujith123.wufoo.com/forms/z1xchp690scddy2/

Where can I report bugs?

Bugs can be reported in the support forum – Support link on the WordPress.org plugin page.

short_description: Import Simple products from VendHQ to WooCommerce and export WooCommerce sales and customers to VendHQ as soon as a WooCommerce order is created.
